message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to make a starting offer of $18000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $12000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you, and it's still a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $16000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $13500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
